topic.title: Neonatal Critical Care Minimum Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe Neonatal Critical Care Minimum Data Set (NCCMDS) provides a record of what happens to a PATIENT when they receive Neonatal Critical Care in a Neonatal Intensive Care Unit, Maternity WARD, or Neonatal Transitional Care WARD.
